news.title: Goldman Sachs tops estimates on boom in equities trading revenue
news.summary: Goldman Sachs joins JPMorgan Chase and Morgan Stanley in posting better-than-expected equities trading revenue. JPMorgan Chase, Morgan Stanley posted better- than-expected Equities Trading Revenue.

news.title: Pfizer scraps daily weight loss pill after liver injury in one patient
news.summary: The decision to stop developing danuglipron adds to a string of setbacks in the pharmaceutical giant's bid to win a slice of the booming market for GLP-1s.

news.title: More than 60% of CEOs expect a recession in the next 6 months as tariff turmoil grows, survey says
news.summary: A rising share of America's top executives sees a recessionary period on the horizon. A growing share of them see the U.S. economy slipping into a recession.

news.title: Billionaire Ray Dalio: 'I'm worried about something worse than a recession'
news.summary: Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio said that he is worried about a breakdown of the global monetary order. Dalio: 'I'm worried about the world's financial system. I'm worried that it's going to fail'

news.title: Why Trump's nuclear talks with Iran could be far more successful than Biden's
news.summary: "The Iranians are, I think, a little bit more desperate than they were in 2022," one analyst says. "They are faced with a very weak economy," another says.

news.title: As ‘sell America’ trade rattles Washington and Wall Street, here’s what could bring U.S. markets back from the brink
news.summary: President Trump’s decision to pause some of his tariffs helped spur a rebound in stocks last week. But it didn’t stop the pressure from spreading to other corners of the financial markets.

news.title: Apple hasn’t gotten an ‘all clear’ on tariffs, but its stock is still surging
news.summary: Apple's smartphones are exempt from the current reciprocal tariffs against China. While Trump promises new tariffs for tech products, Apple seems to have avoided the worst-case scenario.

news.title: This is America’s ‘magic number’ for retirement – and it’s lower this year
news.summary: Workers should replace 80% of their income for each year of retirement, new research suggests. The research was conducted by the Center for Retirement Research at the University of California, San Francisco.

news.title: Investors are jittery about earnings — and that’s opening up big opportunities, say Goldman strategists
news.summary: Fear remains at extreme levels despite 90-day delay in most tariffs, say strategists led by John Marshall, head of derivatives research at Goldman Sachs.

news.title: I held power of attorney for my late brother. Can I withdraw money from his bank account to give to his favorite charity?
news.summary: ‘He honestly believed the power of attorney was also the beneficiary of this account, so a beneficiary was not listed’ said a spokesman.
